definition: clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role

sentences.english: All our packed commodities are of net weight.
sentences.chinese: 我們所包裝的商品均已去盒皮重是淨重量。

sentences.english: The deer dressed out over one hundred pounds.
sentences.chinese: 這隻鹿去毛開膛後淨重100多磅。

sentences.english: Packing Paper bag lined with polyethylene film . Net weight 20kg per bag.
sentences.chinese: 包裝內襯塑料薄膜的複合紙袋，淨重20公斤。

sentences.english: In iron drum of 25kg net each.
The goods were packed in gunny bags of 50kgs net each.
sentences.chinese: 貨物用麻袋包裝，每袋淨重50公斤。

sentences.english: In Single sound gunny bags or p. p. woven bags of 25 kilos net each.
sentences.chinese: 單層完整麻袋或塑編袋，每袋淨重25公斤。

sentences.english: In 3-ply kraft paper of about 40kg net each.
sentences.chinese: 三層牛皮紙袋，每袋淨重約40公斤。

sentences.english: The net weight of this jar of coffee is 180 grams.
In iron drums of 50KG net each.
Packing Coextruded paper bags lined with polyethylene film bags. Net weight 20 kg per bag.
sentences.chinese: 包裝複合紙袋，內襯塑料薄膜袋，淨重20公斤。
這隻鴨煺毛開膛後淨重5磅。

sentences.english: The shortage in net weight of delivered cargo was due to insufficiency of originally dispatched weight.
sentences.chinese: 到貨淨重短少，系原發貨重量不足所致。

sentences.english: Package Paper bag lined with polyethylene film. Net weight: 20kg per bag.
sentences.chinese: 包裝內襯塑料薄膜的複合紙袋，淨重20公斤。

sentences.english: Weight for invoicing purposes shall be established by the actual net weight.
sentences.chinese: 以開發票爲目的重量將由實際淨重確定。

sentences.english: If the net weights are not the same, you have to find out the unit price.
sentences.chinese: 如果淨重不一樣，你就必須找出單價。

sentences.english: To determine the best price, first compare the net weights.
sentences.chinese: 要確定最便宜的價格，首先要比較淨重。
